channel.title: CVE Feed for ELEXtensions -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ELEXtensions -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-32105|2024-04-11T13:16:22.525Z -- elextensions -- elex%20woocommerce%20dynamic%20pricing%20and%20discounts
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ELEXtensions ELEX WooCommerce Dynamic Pricing and Discounts.This issue affects ELEX WooCommerce Dynamic Pricing and Discounts: from n/a through 2.1.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-31255|2024-04-07T17:51:18.318Z -- elextensions -- elex%20woocommerce%20dynamic%20pricing%20and%20discounts
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ELEXtensions ELEX WooCommerce Dynamic Pricing and Discounts allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects ELEX WooCommerce Dynamic Pricing and Discounts: from n/a through 2.1.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-31364|2024-06-04T17:36:30.909Z -- elextensions -- elex%20woocommerce%20dynamic%20pricing%20and%20discounts
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ELEXtensions ELEX WooCommerce Dynamic Pricing and Discounts.This issue affects ELEX WooCommerce Dynamic Pricing and Discounts: from n/a through 2.1.2.
